name: Emerge Career
headline: All-in-one re-entry & workforce development training platform
description: Vocational training programs and workforce management software for government agencies looking to create high-paying jobs and up-skill their low-income and justice-involved citizens out of poverty.

founders.name: Uzoma "Zo" Orchingwa, Co-Founder, Co-CEO
founders.description: Co-founder. In 2022, Zo and Gabe co-founded Ameelio, a tech nonprofit that builds education and communication products for prisons. While scaling Ameelio, they stumbled upon the issue of unemployment post-incarceration which Emerge seeks to address. Zo holds a Masters degree in Criminology from the University of Cambridge, and  a JD-MBA from Yale Law School and Yale School of Management.

founders.name: Gabriel Saruhashi, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder. In 2020, Gabe and Zo co-founded Ameelio, a tech nonprofit that builds education and communication tools for prisons. While scaling Ameelio, they stumbled upon the issue of unemployment post-incarceration which Emerge Career seeks to address. Previously, he was a YC intern and the first product manager at Zippi (YC19). Gabe is a Yale grad, where he co-founded an organization connecting refugees with their new communities, and built an app to assist homeless communities in New Haven.

[About Us](https://www.emergecareer.com/</about>)[Blog ](https://www.emergecareer.com/</blog>)[Apply](https://www.emergecareer.com/<https:/www.app.emergecareer.com/register>)
# All-in-one workforce development training programs
Training programs for government agencies looking to create high-paying jobs and upskill their low-income citizens out of poverty.
Trusted in:
New York
Colorado
[California](https://www.emergecareer.com/</california>)
Massachusetts
**For government agencies:**
[**Request demo**](https://www.emergecareer.com/<https:/forms.gle/D3ibNeNLJFjfYcKi6>)
**For Students**
[**Apply**](https://www.emergecareer.com/<https:/www.app.emergecareer.com/>)
## We offer job training to low-income communities that need it the most
We meet people where they are at. We've worked with justice-involved individuals, SNAP recipients, veterans, and immigrants in their journey towards a new chapter in their lives.
## An end-to-end training platform
Our incentives are aligned with the upskilling goals of government agencies. We only succeed if our students successfully obtain employment.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d414c81fd43817fd43f549_platform_icon.svg)Joining the Movement: Recruitment![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)We collaborate with Community-Based Organizations (CBOs) and various groups to recruit eligible participants to deliver a collaborative training program that complements the efforts of existing on-the-ground organizations.](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d419f1fa7df7f79f0c3a83_learning-hub.svg)2. Easy Access: Digital Learning Hub![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)Our online Learning Hub is a secure interface accessible on any device, even offline.](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d419f12c1ca07c587b9ec8_care-support.svg)We Care: Individualized Support![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)Each student is provided their own dedicated Student Success Coach to support them throughout their journey, offering:![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Mentorship![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Goal Setting![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Guidance to overcome challenges![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Personalized support to sustain motivation](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d419f1b1d817f8aaee0fa1_training.svg)Real World Experience: Hands-on Training![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)We facilitate the placement of students with our trusted partner educators, where they can engage in accelerated hands-on training programs. This collaborative approach ensures that students receive practical, immersive learning experiences that prepare them for their desired careers.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d419f1b1d817f8aaee0fa1_training.svg)Outcome: Lucrative Employment![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)In addition to connecting our graduates with a network of Fair Chance employers, we provide:![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Career Coaching![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Job search strategies![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Interview support![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Resume preparation![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d419f1b1d817f8aaee0fa1_training.svg)Measure Your Impact: Analytics![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)Our analytics empower government agencies with data-driven insights to make informed decisions and evaluate the impact of our programs. It offers real-time transparency on students' training progress, success efforts, and provides exportable reports for easy assessment.](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)

### Prison-To-Employment Pipeline Connecticut
This is a “win-win.” Many formerly incarcerated individuals have trouble finding work upon release, which can drive them back into crime.
**Will Haskell** , Senator

# All-in-one workforce development training programs
Training programs for government agencies looking to create high-paying jobs and upskill their low-income citizens out of poverty.
Trusted in:
New York
Colorado
California⟨5⟩
Massachusetts
**For government agencies:**
**Request demo**⟨6⟩
**For Students**
**Apply**⟨7⟩
## We offer job training to low-income communities that need it the most
We meet people where they are at. We've worked with justice-involved individuals, SNAP recipients, veterans, and immigrants in their journey towards a new chapter in their lives.
## An end-to-end training platform
Our incentives are aligned with the upskilling goals of government agencies. We only succeed if our students successfully obtain employment.
![⟨8⟩Joining the Movement: Recruitment![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)We collaborate with Community-Based Organizations (CBOs) and various groups to recruit eligible participants to deliver a collaborative training program that complements the efforts of existing on-the-ground organizations.](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)![⟨9⟩2. Easy Access: Digital Learning Hub![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)Our online Learning Hub is a secure interface accessible on any device, even offline.](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)![⟨10⟩We Care: Individualized Support![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)Each student is provided their own dedicated Student Success Coach to support them throughout their journey, offering:![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Mentorship![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Goal Setting![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Guidance to overcome challenges![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Personalized support to sustain motivation](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)![⟨11⟩Real World Experience: Hands-on Training![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)We facilitate the placement of students with our trusted partner educators, where they can engage in accelerated hands-on training programs. This collaborative approach ensures that students receive practical, immersive learning experiences that prepare them for their desired careers.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d419f1b1d817f8aaee0fa1_training.svg)Outcome: Lucrative Employment![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)In addition to connecting our graduates with a network of Fair Chance employers, we provide:![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Career Coaching![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Job search strategies![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Interview support![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64e537a36577c822f0c8ce55_check-orange.svg)Resume preparation![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d419f1b1d817f8aaee0fa1_training.svg)Measure Your Impact: Analytics![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64d2c4bda5f0764da07d580c/64d4159d54641c716b05a788_arrow-black.svg)Our analytics empower government agencies with data-driven insights to make informed decisions and evaluate the impact of our programs. It offers real-time transparency on students' training progress, success efforts, and provides exportable reports for easy assessment.](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[](https://www.emergecareer.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Emerge Career**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from the Y Combinator Batch S22, Emerge Career is on a mission to transform workforce development through its innovative, all-in-one re-entry and training platform. The company uniquely focuses on helping low-income and justice-involved individuals land high-paying jobs by offering comprehensive vocational training programs. 

**Core Mission**

Emerge Career aims to upskill economically disadvantaged groups, particularly those affected by the criminal justice system. They design programs specifically for government agencies looking to create pathways to prosperity for their citizens. Their approach is straightforward: provide the resources and support that help people transition into the workforce efficiently.

**Services and Features**

1. **Collaborative Programs:** Emerge Career partners with Community-Based Organizations (CBOs) to recruit eligible participants and ensure a training experience that complements existing social support systems.

2. **Digital Learning Hub:** Their online platform is accessible from any device, allowing students to engage in a secure, flexible learning environment—both online and offline.

3. **Individualized Support:** Each participant is paired with a dedicated Student Success Coach who provides mentorship, goal setting, and advice to navigate challenges.

4. **Hands-on Training:** Emerge Career facilitates real-world training opportunities with trusted educational partners, ensuring students gain practical skills that meet industry demands.

5. **Career Readiness:** They don't just focus on training; Emerge Career emphasizes job placement, offering career coaching, resume preparation, and interview support tailored to the job market.

6. **Impact Measurement:** Utilizing analytics, government agencies can track training outcomes, student progress, and overall program impact, ensuring transparency and accountability.

**Current Operations and Expansion**

Currently, Emerge Career operates in major states like New York, Colorado, Massachusetts, and California, constantly looking to expand their reach and impact. Their impressive metrics include a 94% graduation rate and a perfect placement rate. 

**Future Prospects**

With plans in place for additional trade programs in fields like roofing, welding, and construction, Emerge Career is strategically building a robust pipeline from prison to meaningful employment. Their focus on trauma-informed care ensures that even the most marginalized communities receive the support needed to succeed.

**Leadership and Team**

With a small yet dynamic team of three, backed by the guidance of Y Combinator's Michael Seibel, Emerge Career is positioning itself as an innovative leader in the workforce development space. Their vision of merging technology with compassionate support services promises a brighter future for those often left behind.

For more information, visit their website at [emergecareer.com](https://www.emergecareer.com).
